subject: Finances
Frauds and Swindling
Baseball
Securities and Commodities Violations
Millionaires and Billionaires
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ owner, Fred Wilpon, had invested hundreds of millions of dollars with Bernard L. Madoff, who has been charged with running a $50 billion Ponzi scheme.
snippet: The Mets’ owner, Fred Wilpon, had invested hundreds of millions of dollars with Bernard L. Madoff, who has been charged with running a $50 billion Ponzi scheme.
